channel.title: CVE Feed for CloudLinux Inc -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CloudLinux Inc -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-21956|2024-09-17T01:21:21.049Z -- cloudlinux%20inc -- imunify360
item.description: A php unserialize vulnerability exists in the Ai-Bolit functionality of CloudLinux Inc Imunify360 5.10.2. A specially-crafted malformed file can lead to potential arbitrary command execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
